title: BRIEF-Splitit Says Co-Founder Gil Don To Step Down As CEO

BRIEF-Splitit Says Co-Founder Gil Don To Step Down As CEO

Stock Markets 6 minutes ago (Sep 19, 2019 09:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Splitit Says Co-Founder Gil Don To Step Down As CEO Sept 19 (Reuters) - Splitit Ltd : * CO-FOUNDER, GIL DON, HAS DECIDED TO STEP DOWN FROM HIS ROLE AS CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER * BRAD PATERSON TO BE NEW CEO * DON TO BE REPLACED AS CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER BY BRAD PATERSON * GIL DON TO TAKE UP POSITION AS GENERAL MANAGER, EMEA AND WILL REMAIN ON SPLITIT BOARD
